channel.title: Holy Water on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Holy Water on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: A Machine That Gives You Stuff
item.description: Today in Tedium: Vending machines are one of the few things keeping us away from the dream of a cashless society. The devices, which offer up an array of items for a little bit of pocket change, are silent but prevalent. They represent some of our most technologically advanced furniture, and they’ll probably always be there for us in our time of need. Today’s Tedium discusses their history—along with why, for some reason, they make us want to steal stuff.
